place_on_table.description: place an object a on the table

place_first_on_second.description: place an object a on top of an object b

place_first_in_second.description: place an object a inside an object b

push_first_on_second.description: push an object a onto the top of an object b

get_water_from_faucet.description: get water from the faucet with an object a

pour_water_from_first_to_second.description: pour water from an object a to an object b

push_plate_on_object.description: push plate a on object b
